text: Zoran Krasić (Зоран Красић; 11 March 1956 – 12 April 2018) was a Serbian politician. He served several terms in the parliaments of Yugoslavia and Serbia as a member of the far-right Serbian Radical Party. He was Serbia's Minister of Trade, Tourism and Telecommunications from 1998 to 2000. Krasić died on 12 April 2018, after a short illness in Belgrade at the age of 62."Preminuo potpredsednik SRS Zoran Krasić" , N1, 12 April 2018, accessed 13 April 2018. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Serbian politicians
title: Zoran Krasić
